note: The reported number of publications in 2021 may be lower than the actual count due to lags in data collection.
title: Annual number of scholarly publications on AI, by field of study
subtitle: English-language scholarly publications related to the development and application of artificial intelligence. This includes journal articles, conference papers, repository publications (such as arXiv), books, and theses.
sourceDesc: Center for Security and Emerging Technology via AI Index Report (2022)
